summary:
CHSBv3 and ADM conversions of the rather elegant light elven armor.
By newermind43 : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34074

Lots of clipping sadly at the underarms, leg wrappings.  Though you may not notice it. 
Sorry.  Will fix soon.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img834/1296/banner2new.png[/IMG]

CHSBv3 and ADM conversions of the rather elegant light elven armor.
By newermind43 : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34074

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img694/5503/issues2.png[/IMG]

Lots of clipping sadly at the underarms, leg wrappings.  Though you may not notice it. 
Sorry.  Will fix soon.

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img195/9498/misc2.png[/IMG]

---> \"help \"light elven\" 0\"  and  craftable, upgradable. <---

Endorse the original mod author, not me.  
If you can mesh weight things for skyrim, please have a go at my conversion  :D

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img6/5552/install2.png[/IMG]

-install this  :D
-requires the \"first person skeleton quick fix\" from calyps.  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899  <---NSFW

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img841/61/endbanner2.png[/IMG]
author: newermind43

files.name: ADM Light Elven Armor - esp fix
